// Date formate
export var dateFormate=function dateFormate(date){date=new Date(date);var cdate=date.toDateString();return cdate;};export var formatDateWithAMPM=function formatDateWithAMPM(date){date=new Date(date);var cdate=date.toDateString();var hours=date.getHours();var minutes=date.getMinutes();var ampm=hours>=12?'pm':'am';hours=hours%12;hours=hours?hours:12;hours=hours<10?'0'+hours:hours;minutes=minutes<10?'0'+minutes:minutes;var strTime=cdate+' '+hours+':'+minutes+' '+ampm;return strTime;};// String Short
export var StringShort=function StringShort(data){var string=data;var firstLetter=string.slice(0,1);return firstLetter;};// Shopping-cart Price Calculator
export var priceCalculator=function priceCalculator(products){var total=0;var campaignSubTotal=0;var regularSubTotal=0;if(products&&products.length){var discountType;var discountAmount;var discountStartFrom;var discountEndTo;for(var i=0;i<products.length;i++){var element=products[i];if(element.shopType&&element.shopType==='campaign'){campaignSubTotal+=element.price*element.quantity;discountType=element.discountType;discountAmount=element.discountAmount;discountStartFrom=element.startFrom;discountEndTo=element.endTo;}else{regularSubTotal+=element.price*element.quantity;}}if(discountType&&discountType==='Flat'){if(campaignSubTotal>=discountStartFrom&&campaignSubTotal<=discountEndTo){campaignSubTotal=campaignSubTotal-discountAmount;}}if(discountType&&discountType==='Percentage'){if(campaignSubTotal>=discountStartFrom&&campaignSubTotal<=discountEndTo){campaignSubTotal=parseInt(campaignSubTotal*discountAmount/100);}}total=campaignSubTotal+regularSubTotal;return total;}};// Calculated Price
var CalculatedPrice=function CalculatedPrice(discountType,discountAmount,salePrice,material){var total=0;if(material){total=salePrice+material.adjustmentSellingPrice;}else{total=salePrice;}if(discountType&&discountAmount){if(discountType==='Flat'){total=total-discountAmount;}else{var percentTk=parseInt(discountAmount/100*total);total=parseInt(total)-percentTk;}}return total;};// Get initial material
export var InitialMaterial=function InitialMaterial(data){var newItem=null;if(data&&data.length&&data[0].title){var element=data[0].properties;if(element&&element.length){var item=element[0];newItem={item:data[0].title,sku:item.sku,adjustmentSellingPrice:item.adjustmentSellingPrice,adjustmentPurchasePrice:item.adjustmentPurchasePrice,value:item.values[0]};}}return newItem;};// Prepare to cart 
export var PrepareCart=function PrepareCart(data,material){var product={_id:data._id,name:data.name,sku:data.sku,slug:data.slug,quantity:1,brand:data.brand,vendor:data.vendor,mainCategory:data.mainCategory,subCategory:data.subCategory?data.subCategory:null,leafCategory:data.leafCategory?data.leafCategory:null,purchasePrice:data.purchasePrice,salePrice:data.salePrice,discountType:data.discountType?data.discountType:null,discountAmount:data.discountAmount?data.discountAmount:null,thumbnail:data.thumbnail.small,stockAmount:data.stockAmount,price:CalculatedPrice(data.discountType,data.discountAmount,data.salePrice,material),materials:material?material:null};return product;};// Make option
export var MakeOption=function MakeOption(data){var options=[];if(data&&data.length){for(var i=0;i<data.length;i++){var element=data[i];options.push({value:element._id,label:element.name});}}return options;};// Extract option
export var ExtractOption=function ExtractOption(data){var options=[];if(data&&data.length){for(var i=0;i<data.length;i++){var element=data[i];options.push(element.value);}}return options;};
